name: Fruity Collector
description:
Why do I have to pay? (Well since this is the Early Release of the game I would like to make it only available if you pay... does that make since? If not you can comment why?)

Controls:

Up Arrow = 1x Jump, 2x Double Jump

Right Arrow = Go Right

Left Arrow = Go Left

Goal:

Collect all the Apples in the level!

What to do: 

Once you have entered the End Screen in the text box type {"Yes" to Restart} or {"No" to go to Credits}

Other:

More updates coming soon! {Note: This was made in the free version of Construct 3, I will buy the Paid Version soon!}
